name: Living Trap
immunities: poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: Understands Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The living trap can use its action to polymorph into a section of ruined terrain no larger than 10 foot radius sphere. This form can include objects and structural features such as doors and pillars. Its statistics are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: False Appearance (terrain form only)
traits.desc: The living trap is indistinguishable from an ordinary section of ruined terrain.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The living trap can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 17 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The living trap makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Detect
legendary.desc: The living trap makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Slam Attack
legendary.desc: The living trap makes a slam attack.

legendary.name: Entangle (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Each creature within 15 feet of the living trap must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or it is grappled (Escape DC 16).
